description: Identify the UI components in a typical Instagram post
explanation: An Instagram post combines several component types: Image components for both the profile picture and main photo, a Text label for the username, Icon buttons for interactive actions (like, comment, share), a Repeating group for the comments section (a dynamic list of similar items), and Text with formula for the relative timestamp (e.g., '2 hours ago' calculated from post time).

description: Break down the components of a tweet
explanation: A tweet uses an Image component for the avatar, multiple Text labels for the display name, handle, and tweet body, Icon buttons for the reply/retweet/like actions, and Text with formula for computed values like the like count (which updates dynamically). Note how one component type (Text label) can appear multiple times with different content.

description: Analyze the components of a weather forecast widget
explanation: A weather app widget uses a Text label for the city name (static display), Text with formula for the temperature (computed from API data and unit conversion) and last updated time, an Image component for the weather condition icon, and a Repeating group for the forecast row (each day repeats the same structure: day, icon, temperature).

description: Identify components in a chat messaging interface
explanation: A chat interface uses an Image component for the contact avatar, a Text label for the contact name, a Repeating group for the message list (each message is a repeated item with the same structure), an Input field for typing messages, an Icon button for sending, and Text with formula for timestamps (formatted relative to current time).

description: Break down a product listing card from an online store
explanation: An e-commerce product card uses an Image component for the product photo, a Text label for the product name, Text with formula for both the price (formatted with currency symbol, possibly computed with discounts) and reviews count, a Rating component for the star display (a specialized component that converts a numeric score to visual stars), and an Action button for 'Add to Cart' (a button with text, distinct from an icon-only button).
